    • Method Detail

      • createMessageFile

        public static void createMessageFile()
        Creates the messages.yml. This should only be used by NovaGamesLib on enable.

      • getMessagesFile

        public static java.io.File getMessagesFile()
        Gets the messages File. Use getMessagesYml() to get the messages YML.
        Returns:
        The messages file.

      • getMessagesYml

        public static org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration getMessagesYml()
        Gets the messages YML. Use getMessagesFile() to get the Messages File.
        Returns:
        The messages yml.

      • getMessage

        public static java.lang.String getMessage(java.lang.String msgLoc)
        Gets the message from the messages file, with translated color codes, at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        msgLoc - The location of the message.
        Returns:
        The message with chat color codes translated.

      • getMessage

        public static java.lang.String getMessage(java.lang.String msgLoc,
                          int id)
        Gets the message from the messages file, with translated color codes and all %id% vars replaced, at the specified location.
        Parameters:
        msgLoc - The location of the message.
        id - The id to replace all %id% vars with.
        Returns:
        The message wil chat color codes translated and all %id% vars replaced.

      • saveMessages

        public static void saveMessages(org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration msgYml)
        Saves the messages file.
        Parameters:
        msgYml - The instance of the messages file to save.
